TopicTitle: What happened in Squadcast on Friday?

Articles.Content:
Due to ObsessedWithKSP's apparent desertion of his Squadcast summaries, does anyone else know what happened?

BTW where can you find Squadcast on KSPTV broadcasts????

Due to ObsessedWithKSP's apparent desertion of his Squadcast summaries, does anyone else know what happened?

BTW where can you find Squadcast on KSPTV broadcasts????

It seems there wasn't a Squadcast on Friday (Jan 9). I wasn't watching live, but at least it doesn't show in the KSPTV past broadcasts list. http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/profile/past_broadcasts
This is the one you're looking for, Twitch labelled it wrongly: http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv/v/3675242

Apparently the first beta patch is planned to "contain a tech tree that doesn't remind you of the current one at all" and that mk1 plane parts might be moved earlier.

Don't take my word for it though, it's around 31:50.
I've always said that the tech tree, as the oldest career mode system of them all, would be one of the first things that gets revamped in beta. I can dig it
I hope for the tech web like in beyond earth. or the custom tree idea i had a long while ago that ive seen a few others suggest.
I do not know if maxmaps understood the question about ISP changing thrust instead of fuel usage correctly?

I haven't deserted them, I missed one due to an inconvenient schedule at home (which was mentioned as possibility when I started it). Apologies, I'll try and catch the next one. 5th Horseman did a fantastic write up of it here in my place.
